fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Guess if another player is (5145) The Devil On Your Shoulder (Devil for short). If you are correct, you are notified and you deal an Overkill Attack to them.
- Learn the subalignment that another player appears to be.

fields.name: Guess Attributes:
fields.value:
- Redirect Immune
- Roleblock Immune
- Astral
- Bypasses Disguises
- You only have one and cannot be granted more.

fields.name: General Attributes:
fields.value:
- Conversion Immune
- You have a private chat with the Power/Head/Leader of your faction.
- If this would spawn with a faction that has no Power/Head/Leader, reroll this.
- Force-spawn the Devil if it doesn't already exist.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Eliminate the Devil and ensure the victory of your faction.
